Uses of Class
io.ebean.search.TextQueryString

  • Packages that use TextQueryString 
    Package Description
    io.ebean
    Core API (see Database, DB and Query).
    io.ebean.search
    Provides text search expressions like Match, TextQueryString etc.

    • Uses of TextQueryString in io.ebean

      Methods in io.ebean with parameters of type TextQueryString 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Expression ExpressionFactory.textQueryString​(String search, TextQueryString options)
      Create a text query string expression (currently doc store/Elastic only).
      ExpressionList<T> ExpressionList.textQueryString​(String search, TextQueryString options)
      Add a query string expression.
